description.en: Gets or sets visibility of icon on error message.
description.jp: Gets or sets visibility of icon on error message.

description.en: Gets or sets duration of show animation in milliseconds.
description.jp: Gets or sets duration of show animation in milliseconds.

description.en: Gets or sets duration of hide animation in milliseconds.
description.jp: Gets or sets duration of hide animation in milliseconds.

description.en: Gets or sets ability to apply error css to target element.
description.jp: Gets or sets ability to apply error css to target element.

description.en: Gets or sets location of error label relative to target element.
description.jp: Gets or sets location of error label relative to target element.

description.en: Gets or sets option to set focus back to editor when validation failed. Default value comes from corresponding member in $.ui.igValidator.defaults object, which is undefined.
description.jp: Gets or sets option to set focus back to editor when validation failed. Default value comes from corresponding member in $.ui.igValidator.defaults object, which is undefined.

description.en: Don't keep focus
description.jp: Don't keep focus

description.en: Keep the focus only once
description.jp: Keep the focus only once

description.en: Always keep the focus
description.jp: Always keep the focus

description.en: Gets or sets triggering validation when value in editor was changed.
description.jp: Gets or sets triggering validation when value in editor was changed.

description.en: Gets or sets triggering validation when editor lost focus.
description.jp: Gets or sets triggering validation when editor lost focus.

description.en: Gets or sets triggering validation when application called form.submit().
description.jp: Gets or sets triggering validation when application called form.submit().

description.en: Gets or sets triggering validation when form gets onsubmit event.
description.jp: Gets or sets triggering validation when form gets onsubmit event.

description.en: Gets or sets parent/location of error message.
description.jp: Gets or sets parent/location of error message.

description.en: Gets or sets option to validate if value was entered (not empty text, selected item, etc.)
description.jp: Gets or sets option to validate if value was entered (not empty text, selected item, etc.)

description.en: Gets or sets minimum length of text or minimum number of selected items.
description.jp: Gets or sets minimum length of text or minimum number of selected items.

description.en: Gets or sets maximum length of text or maximum number of selected items.
description.jp: Gets or sets maximum length of text or maximum number of selected items.

description.en: Gets or sets validation for minimum number.
description.jp: Gets or sets validation for minimum number.

description.en: Gets or sets validation for maximum number.
description.jp: Gets or sets validation for maximum number.

description.en: Gets or sets regular expression which is used to validate value in text editor.
description.jp: Gets or sets regular expression which is used to validate value in text editor.

description.en: Gets or sets option to use the name attribute of checkboxes in order to validate ranges.
description.jp: Gets or sets option to use the name attribute of checkboxes in order to validate ranges.

description.en: Gets or sets selector for css classes.
description.jp: Gets or sets selector for css classes.

description.en: Gets or sets text for error-message which overrides all possible specific error-messages.
description.jp: Gets or sets text for error-message which overrides all possible specific error-messages.
